sf277:4: bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ lokaḥ saṁvartate | saṁvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante | te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṁ gopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagāminaḥ prītibhakṣāḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti |
sf277:5: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ekodikā bhavati ekārṇavā | tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vāyunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti tadyathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoty evam eva tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vayunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti | sa bhavati pṛthivīraso varṇasaṁpanno gandhasaṁpanno rasasaṁpannaḥ | tadyathā navanītam evaṁvarṇaḥ | tadyathā kṣaudraṁ madhv aneḍakam evamāsvādaḥ |
sf277:6: bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ loko vivartate | vivartamāne loke satvā āyuḥkṣayāt karmakṣayāt puṇyakṣayād ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cavitvā ihatye manuṣyasabhāgatām āgaccanti | te ’pi rūpiṇo pūrvavad yāvad dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti |
sf277:7: tena khalu samayena na sūryacandramasau prajñāyete na rātridivasaṁ na māsaṁ ardhamāsaṁ na ṛtuṁ na kṣaṇalavamuhūrtaṁ prajñāyante … na strī na pumān | satvaḥ satva ity ekasaṁkhyāṁ gacchati |
sf277:8: athānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ satvaḥ aṁgulyagreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayati | yathā yathāsvādayati tathā tathā pratikāṁkṣati | yathā yathā pratikāṁkṣati tathā tathā kabaḍiṁkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ |
sf277:9: adrākṣur anyatame satvās taṁ satvaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa pṛthivīrasaṁ paribhuñjānam | dṛṣṭvā ca te ’pi satvā aṁgulyāgreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayanti | yathā yathāsvādayanti pūrvavad yāvad kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ | yataś ca te satvā taṁ pṛthivīrasaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktās teṣāṁ kāye dṛḍhatvaṁ gurutvaṁ prajñāyete śubhavarṇo ’ntarhitaḥ | andhakāro loke prādurbhūtaḥ |
sf277:10: dharmatā khalu vāsiṣṭha andhakārasya loke prādurbhāvāt sūryacandramasau prajñāyete etc. as in 4.
